title: EVE'S BRA font?
content:
Hi Guys,

do you have an idea what's this typeface?

Here is a link: [http://www.evesbrainternational.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20120913070628/http:/www.evesbrainternational.com/ "http://www.evesbrainternational.com/") or have a look at image.

Thanks a million!!!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [eves bra.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20120913070628/http:/typophile.com/files/eves%20bra_0.png) | 8.95 KB |
author: evelinat

comments.content:
Looks very close to Jos Buivenga's [Museo](http://web.archive.org/web/20120913070628/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/exljbris/museo/100/). Maybe a customization?

- Mike Yanega
Thnk you! Yes, Museo is very close. And it's a customization.
Also has a bit of a [Sauna](http://web.archive.org/web/20120913070628/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/underware/sauna_roman/?&sample_text=EVE'S%20BRA&sample_size=96) feel to it.
